description:
Ichigo rushes to the site where Byakuya and Kariya are fighting and releases his Bankai upon Kariya. Byakuya also releases his Bankai to attack Kariya, but Ichigo and Byakuya are not in sync and can`t harm Kariya. The three reach a deadlock. Suddenly someone attacks with immense spiritual pressure. She calls herself Rantao and is the creator of the Bounts. Meanwhile, Ganju and others arrive at Bull`s hideout in Kusajishi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo Byakuya Kariya, Battle of the Three Extremes!
Ichigo Byakuya Kariya, Sankyoku no Tatakai!
Ichigo, Byakuya, Kariya, le combat des trois extrêmes !
一護・白哉・狩矢, 三極の戦い!
